column4: I would like to know what most of you might consider the top five photo editors to use on Ubuntu
I have been using Gimp for years and find that I can do pretty much everything that is needed, or at least accdording to my needs.

I, too, use just GIMP. I do many things with it. But I'm not a professinal and I even don't know 90 % of it maybe. But I can do pretty much things witjh it. Without GIMP life would be really hard for me.
